name: Drone Master
description:
Drone Master.

Your goal is to get to exit of each level.
Optionally there are cogs to collect.
On each level you can find box that can be delivered to exit.
After completing the level you can come back to beat the "Hermit Challenge".
Global Leaderboards available!

Controls on Keyboard:
WSAD - Control drone
F  - Start/Stop engine
E - Activate Crane
I / K - Pull and extend rope when crane is active
Space  - Grab when crane is active 
ESC - Pause the game  
Enter - Restart current level

Controls on GamePad:
Left Analog - Control Drone
Left Trigger - Decrease throttle
Right Trigger -  Increase throttle
Triangle - Start Engines
Circle - Activate Crane
Right Analog Up / Down - pull and extend rope when crane is active
Cross - Grab when crane is active 
Select - Restart current level
Start - Pause the game
